Cell.Data: PLAYER_INTERACTION_AMAZON

The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
SCENE ID
TEXT ID
ENGLISH STRING
LOCALIZED STRING
ALTERNATIVE ENGLISH STRING
ALTERNATIVE LOCALIZED STRING
LOCALIZATION NOTES
DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEGATIVE_01

Tread carefully, {STR_leaderName}. The Amazons have claimed this planet in the name of the Grand Matriarch, and we do not appreciate uninvited strangers. If you have something to say, spit it out and then leave us be. Or must we teach you a lesson you won’t soon forget?
你最好小心点，{STR_leaderName}。亚马逊人已经以大族长的名义占领了这个星球，我们不喜欢不速之客。如果你有话想对我们说，那就赶快说完然后离开。还是说非得要我们给你点记忆深刻的教训不成？

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEGATIVE_02
We know why you have come here, {STR_leaderName}, and we are displeased with your intentions. Do not provoke our ire, or you may end up on the wrong end of one of our warbeasts.
{STR_leaderName}，我们知道你来这里的意图，我们对此感到不快。不要挑战我们的底线，否则你将会成为我们战兽的食物。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEGATIVE_03
Do not attempt to wrong us, {STR_leaderName}, for we have no qualms with putting you down. You should therefore choose your words very carefully. Few survive the wrath of the Amazons.
{STR_leaderName}，不要试图栽赃指责我们，因为我们会毫无顾忌地将你打倒。注意你的言辞，没有人能够在亚马逊人的怒火中幸免于难。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEUTRAL_01
Hail, {STR_leaderName}. I am surprised that anyone without the benefit of Amazon augmetics could even survive in this place. What brings you here? I hope your ethics align with ours.
你好，{STR_leaderName}。居然有人能够在不借助亚马逊人强化装备的情况下在这个地方存活下来，真是太不可思议了。你为什么来这儿？希望你的行为准则和我们是一致的。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEUTRAL_02
Greetings, traveler. This world is under the protection of the Amazons. Know that we do not tolerate destructive interlopers. Now, what are you looking for?
你好，旅行者。这个星球由亚马逊人保护。记住，我们不会容忍那些四处破坏的闯入者。现在告诉我，你想要什么？

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEUTRAL_03

Greetings, {STR_leaderName}. We are the Amazons. Our seclusion has ended, and we are destined to become one of the greatest powers in the galaxy. Good allies are hard to find, and so we ask: which philosophy do you follow?
你好，{STR_leaderName}，我们是亚马逊人。我们的归隐生活已经结束，我们注定会成为这个星系的强大势力之一。良友难觅，所以我们想问问你们遵循哪种思想体系？

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_NEUTRAL_04
Greetings, commander. Do you wish to share and grow with us? Or do you desire conflict instead? The Amazon ability to adapt is unmatched, so we can provide either in equal measure.
你好，指挥官。你是想和我们分享资源并共同繁荣还是想制造事端？亚马逊人的适应力无与伦比，所以无论你出于什么目的，我们都能应对。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_POSITIVE_01
Hail to you, {STR_leaderName}! My sister Amazons detected your arrival, and we would like to open the floor for political conversation. We are happy to share this burgeoning paradise with you.
你好，{STR_leaderName}！我的亚马逊姐妹们侦测到了你的到来，希望我们能打开天窗谈政治。我们很乐意与你分享这片生机勃勃的乐土。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_FIRSTMEET_POSITIVE_02
By the Mother, {STR_leaderName}, it is good to hear a friendly voice. Your good deeds are common knowledge. Let us share ideas on how to change this world for the better.
托自然之母的福，{STR_leaderName}，能够听到你那友善的声音真是太好了。你的善行已人尽皆知，让我们共同分享交流，让这个世界变得更加美好。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_NEGATIVE_01
Yes? What is it? The jungle swallows the weak rather quickly, so if I were you, I wouldn’t waste any time in getting to the point.
嗯？什么？弱者在丛林中很快便会消亡。所以如果我是你，我就会马上直奔主题，不浪费任何时间。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_NEUTRAL_01
Hail, warchief. Mind if we keep this short? The Matriarchs are waiting patiently for our conversation to bear fruit.
您好，首领。不介意我们长话短说吧？族长们正在耐心等待我们的谈话结果。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_TRADE_PROPOSE_NEUTRAL_01
Perhaps you would like to trade with us? I’m sure something our packbeasts have brought will spark your interest.
也许你想要与我们进行交易？相信我们的一些东西能够引起你的兴趣。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_TRADE_PROPOSE_NEGATIVE_01
You have something we need. We can give you something for it. That will be the extent of our interaction.
你有我们需要的东西，我们可以给你一些东西来交换。我们之间的往来仅限于此。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
HEADER
GREET_TRADE_RECEIVED_01
We appreciate the request, and will consider your offer.
感谢你的提议，我们会好好考虑的。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_WAR_01

You have desecrated these lands for the last time, {STR_leaderName}! {STR_reasons}. My Amazon war-host is readying for battle. We would enjoy at least a minor amount of resistance from you, so we suggest you prepare yourself for war.
这将是你最后一次亵渎这片土地，{STR_leaderName}！{STR_reasons}。我们亚马逊人已做好了战斗准备。我们建议你应当如此，因为我们将会享受你那可悲的负隅顽抗。

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. {STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. {STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_WAR_02
{STR_reasons}. You have threatened the Amazon way of life, and have blighted this planet with the disease of your presence! We have the cure: total annihilation.
{STR_reasons}。你威胁到了亚马逊人的生活方式，玷污了这个星球！我们找到了解药：那就是彻底消灭你。

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. {STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. {STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
INSULT_01
You truly are a pathetic creature. Under-educated, under-evolved… and beneath my contempt.
你真是个可怜的家伙。未受过良好教育，也未进化完好…卑劣到极点。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
INSULT_02
Hah! Is that gaggle of schoolboys what you call an army? If my sisters had time, they’d put you down like rabid Hopperhounds.
哈！你把那群叽叽喳喳的孩子叫作军队？如果我的姐妹们有时间，她们会像疯狂的跳蝗一样把你们放倒。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
INSULT_03
In you I see the same frightful stare of a prey animal. You scamper about this world claiming whatever meagre scraps you can. Prey do not lead, they do not prosper... they are hunted.
我在你身上看到了猎物一样畏惧的眼神。尽管抢走这个星球上的那些破铜烂铁吧，因为猎物不会领先于我们，也不会繁荣壮大…猎物只会被猎杀。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_FRIENDSHIP_01
What a fine specimen you make, {STR_leaderName}. Your genetic traits seem very desirable. We would be interested in examining them more closely.
你是一个完美的标本，{STR_leaderName}。你的基因特征很吸引人，我们有兴趣更仔细地研究一下。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_FRIENDSHIP_02
We are impressed with your tactical acumen. You fight like an Amazon! Keep it up and you’ll soon start to rival the greatest predators.
你的战术才能让人印象深刻，你战斗的样子像极了亚马逊人！继续保持下去，很快你就可以与最强大的掠食者抗衡了。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ACTION
DECLARE_FRIENDSHIP_03
Your modus operandi displays the discretion of a Tyrannodon and the intelligence of a Spacer chem-slave.
你的做法展现出了暴龙的谨慎和那些太空掠夺者化学奴隶一般的智慧。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
TRADE
ACCEPT_KINDLY_POSITIVE
We accept the terms of the deal. We are both made stronger by this exchange.
我们接受交易条款。通过这次交易，我们都将变得更加强大。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
TRADE
ACCEPT_DOUBTFUL
Accepted. If we had any other choice, we’d take it. You are lucky we’re feeling lenient.
接受。但如果我们还有别的选择，肯定不会这样做的。你应该感到幸运，我们对你很仁慈。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
TRADE
DECLINE_IMBALANCE_01
We must decline the deal. Come back with a more interesting offer.
我们必须拒绝这笔交易。等你有了更好的提议后再来吧。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
TRADE
DECLINE_IMBALANCE_02
Unacceptable. Do not mistake us for dim-witted brutes. Make a better offer!
无法接受。别以为我们是愚蠢的畜生，带着更好的提议再来！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

Note that all the texts in this document that refer to two people - the speaker and the one spoken too - that can both be male or female.
Note that use of the 'localized' and 'alternative localized string' only applies for the gender of the speaker.
If the gender of the person spoken to requires inflection, please try to translate the text in a way that doesn't require such inflection. If this is impossible, please get in touch with us informing us of which lines this concerns and how they would be inflected in the language you are translating too.
